title: Annual Report 2024
code: # Grab output from ORCID where possible orcid <- staff_ids |>   pull(orcid_id) |>   na.omit() |>   fetch_orcid() |>   filter(publication_year == 2024) # Otherwise grab output from Scholar scholar <- staff_ids |>   filter(is.na(orcid_id)) |>   pull(scholar_id) |>   na.omit() |>   fetch_scholar() |>   filter(publication_year == 2024)

what: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: Download wrangle publication data Monash EBS academic staff

title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: spiderorchid R package provides tools retrieve research publications Google Scholar, ORCID PURE, DOIs, along CRAN package download statistics. tailored academic researchers EBS department wish consolidate analyze research outputs, also monitoring contributions CRAN. also provides journal ranking information various sources, including Monash Business School, Australian Business Deans’ Council, CORE, SCImago ERA2010. main functions included : fetch_scholar: Retrieves publication details Google Scholar given IDs. fetch_orcid: Retrieves publication details ORCID given IDs. fetch_doi: Retrieves publication details given DOIS. fetch_pure: Retrieves publication details PURE specific years. fetch_cran: Searches CRAN packages author’s name returns relevant package information number downloads last update date. journal_ranking: Return journal ranking information Monash Business School, Australian Business Deans’ Council lists. package caches results within R session. fetch data multiple times, download .

title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
code: # Install the packages needed pak::pak(c("robjhyndman/pkgmeta", "numbats/spiderorchid")) library(spiderorchid) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: staff_ids.csv dataset contains mappings researchers’ names respective ORCID Google Scholar IDs. useful linking identifying academic profiles across different platforms.
code: staff_ids #> # A tibble: 57 × 4 #>    first_name last_name orcid_id            scholar_id   #>    <chr>      <chr>     <chr>               <chr>        #>  1 Akanksha   Negi      0000-0003-2531-9408 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ #>  2 Alyssa     Hu        0000-0002-9013-8374 IIDTKgsAAAAJ #>  3 Andrew     Matthews  <NA>                <NA>         #>  4 Ann        Maharaj   0000-0002-5513-962X BZ07eocAAAAJ #>  5 Athanasios Pantelous 0000-0001-5738-1471 ZMaiiQwAAAAJ #>  6 Benjamin   Wong      0000-0002-1665-6165 Nneg6GAAAAAJ #>  7 Bin        Peng      0000-0003-4231-4713 5d3ZOm4AAAAJ #>  8 Bonsoo     Koo       0000-0002-7247-9773 OmK08lAAAAAJ #>  9 Brett      Inder     <NA>                Wx6eeWgAAAAJ #> 10 Catherine  Forbes    0000-0003-3830-5865 jm73LccAAAAJ #> # ℹ 47 more rows

title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: Given vector Google Scholar IDs, fetch_scholar() function retrieves publication details returns form data frame, one row per publication.
code: staff_ids |>   filter(last_name %in% c("Negi", "Lydeamore")) |>   pull(scholar_id) |>   fetch_scholar() #> # A tibble: 50 × 6 #>    scholar_id   authors                title publication_year journal_name DOI   #>    <chr>        <chr>                  <chr>            <int> <chr>        <chr> #>  1 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ A Negi, D Roy          The …             2015 IFPRI Discu… <NA>  #>  2 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ R Chandra, PK Joshi, … Dyna…             2017 IFPRI book … <NA>  #>  3 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ P Birthal, A Negi, PK… Unde…             2019 Journal of … <NA>  #>  4 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ A Negi, JM Wooldridge  Revi…             2021 Econometric… <NA>  #>  5 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ C Cox, A Negi, D Negi  Risk…             2023 Available a… <NA>  #>  6 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ G Rathnayake, A Negi,… Diff…             2024 arXiv prepr… <NA>  #>  7 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ A Negi, W Jeffrey M    Doub…             2024 Econometric… <NA>  #>  8 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ A Negi                 Doub…             2024 Journal of … <NA>  #>  9 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ A Negi, DS Negi        Diff…             2025 Journal of … <NA>  #> 10 Gcz8Ng0AAAAJ A Negi, D Nibbering    Iden…             2025 arXiv prepr… <NA>  #> # ℹ 40 more rows

title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: Given vector ORCID IDs, fetch_orcid() function retrieves publication details returns form data frame, one row per publication. fetch_orcid() function requires authentication ORCID. previously authenticated, prompt first run. just follow prompts, authenticated, downloading papers. want download papers ORCID IDs, need authenticate 2-legged OAuth. Follow instructions https://info.orcid.org/register--client-application-production-member-api/. avoid session, store token obtained orcid_auth() .Renviron file running usethis::edit_r_environ(). form ORCID_TOKEN=<token>.
code: staff_ids |>   filter(last_name %in% c("Negi", "Lydeamore")) |>   pull(orcid_id) |>   fetch_orcid() #> # A tibble: 17 × 9 #>    orcid_id authors publication_year title journal_name volume issue doi   page  #>    <chr>    <chr>              <int> <chr> <chr>        <chr>  <chr> <chr> <chr> #>  1 0000-00… "Micha…             2016 Choi… Bulletin of… 78     2     10.1… 293-… #>  2 0000-00… "Thiri…             2017 Indi… PeerJ        5      <NA>  10.7… e3958 #>  3 0000-00… "M. title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: Given vector years, fetch_pure() function retrieves publication details PURE system academic staff Department Econometrics & Business Statistics, Monash University. fetch_pure() function requires API key access PURE system. API key stored environment variable PURE_API_KEY. function restricted Monash IP addresses; either use campus invoke VPN using campus. return publications specified years, coauthored members Department Econometrics & Business Statistics, Monash University. function run periodically, data stored ebs_pure. Currently, stored data includes publications January 2018 May 2025.
code: fetch_pure(2024) #> # A tibble: 83 × 8 #>    pure_id    year authors                     title journal subtype bib   doi   #>    <chr>     <int> <chr>                       <chr> <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr> #>  1 580119537  2024 Negi, A & Wooldridge, JM    Doub… Econom… Article Negi… 10.1… #>  2 578896645  2024 Negi, A                     Doub… Journa… Article Negi… 10.1… #>  3 577211348  2024 Nibbering, D                A hi… Journa… Article Nibb… 10.1… #>  4 576146015  2024 Rostami-Tabar, B & Hyndman… Hier… Journa… Article Rost… 10.1… #>  5 574756920  2024 Fang, X, Zhou, J, Pantelou… A ma… Expert… Article Fang… 10.1… #>  6 571851299  2024 Kim, HY & McLaren, KR       Inte… Resear… Article Kim,… 10.1… #>  7 571257919  2024 Gao, J, Peng, B, Wu, WB & … Time… Journa… Article Gao,… 10.1… #>  8 571257838  2024 Yan, Y, Gao, J & Peng, B    Asym… Econom… Article Yan,… 10.1… #>  9 565992428  2024 Athanasopoulos, G, Hyndman… Fore… Intern… Article Atha… 10.1… #> 10 564353599  2024 Wang, G, Zhou, J, Pantelou… A de… Comput… Article Wang… 10.1… #> # title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: function retrieves information CRAN packages authored specified individuals. returns data frame containing package name, number downloads, authors, last update date.
code: c(   "Michael Lydeamore",   "Di Cook",   "Dianne Cook" ) |>   fetch_cran() #> # A tibble: 43 × 11 #>    package         date       title   description version authors url   cran_url #>    <chr>           <date>     <chr>   <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>    #>  1 cardinalR       2025-12-18 "Colle… "A collect… 1.0.6   "Jayan… http… https:/… #>  2 condensr        2023-08-30 "Acade… "Helps aut… 1.0.0   "Micha… http… https:/… #>  3 HospitalNetwork 2024-12-22 "Build… "Set of to… 0.9.4   "Pasca… http… https:/… #>  4 quollr          2025-12-18 "Visua… "To constr… 1.0.6   "Jayan… http… https:/… #>  5 brolgar         2025-09-03 "Brows… "Provides … 1.0.2   "Nicho… http… https:/… #>  6 eechidna        2021-02-25 "Explo… "Data from… 1.4.1   "Jerem… http… https:/… #>  7 fabletools      2025-09-01 "Core … "Provides … 0.5.1   "Mitch… http… https:/… #>  8 feasts          2025-08-27 "Featu… "Provides … 0.4.2   "Mitch… http… https:/… #>  9 geozoo          2016-05-07 "Zoo o… "Geometric… 0.5.1   "Barre… http… https:/… #> 10 GGally          2025-08-23 "Exten… "The R pac… 2.4.0   "Barre… http… https:/… #> # ℹ 33 more rows #> # ℹ 3 more variables: github_url <chr>, first_download <date>, downloads <dbl>

title: Download and wrangle publication data for Monash EBS academic staff
text: function retrieves journal ranking information list journals. rankings Monash Business School (default), Australian Business Deans’ Council, Computing Research Education Association Australasia, SCImago ERA2010. returns data frame containing journal names, rankings. Fuzzy matching used, works best use correct journal name. Multiple matches can returned journal name ambiguous. shiny app allows explore journal rankings interactively.
code: c(   "Annals of Statistics",   "Journal of the American Statistical Association",   "Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics",   "International Journal of Forecasting" ) |>   journal_ranking() #> # A tibble: 4 × 2 #>   title                                             rank     #>   <chr>                                             <fct>    #> 1 Annals of Statistics                              Group 1+ #> 2 Journal of the American Statistical Association   Group 1+ #> 3 Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics Group 1  #> 4 International Journal of Forecasting              Group 2 journal_ranking("Forecasting") #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   title                                       rank    #>   <chr>                                       <fct>   #> 1 International Journal of Forecasting        Group 2 #> 2 Journal of Forecasting                      Group 2 #> 3 Technological Forecasting and Social Change Group 2

text: https://www.core.edu.au/conference-portal

title: CORE (Computing Research and Education) lists of conference and journal rankings — core
text: core data frame 982 observations two variables: title: Title conference rank: Conferences assigned one following categories: *: flagship conference, leading venue discipline area : excellent conference, highly respected discipline area B: good conference, well regarded discipline area C: ranked conference venues meet minimum standards core_journals data frame 639 observations 4 variables: title: Title journal field_of_research: Field Research Code provided Australian Bureau Statistics issn: International Standard Serial Number rank: order best lowest rank: *, , B, C

title: CORE (Computing Research and Education) lists of conference and journal rankings — core
text: CORE association university departments computer science Australia New Zealand. Prior 2004 known Computer Science Association, CSA. CORE Conference Ranking provides assessments major conferences computing disciplines. rankings managed CORE Executive Committee, periodic rounds submission requests addition reranking conferences. Decisions made academic committees based objective data requested part submission process. Conference rankings determined mix indicators, including citation rates, paper submission acceptance rates, visibility research track record key people hosting conference managing technical program. detailed statement categorizing ranks *, , B, C can found .

title: Fetch packages from CRAN — fetch_cran
text: function searches CRAN packages author names. Note authors may use different name variations CRAN (e.g., "Di Cook" "Dianne Cook"), may necessary call function several variations.

title: Fetch packages from CRAN — fetch_cran
code: fetch_cran(   author_names = NULL,   package_names = NULL,   downloads_from = "2000-01-01",   downloads_to = Sys.Date() )

title: Fetch packages from CRAN — fetch_cran
text: author_names character vector containing authors' names form used CRAN. package_names character vector package names. Ignored author_names provided. downloads_from date character string format "YYYY-MM-DD" specifying date start counting downloads. Default "2000-01-01". downloads_to date character string format "YYYY-MM-DD" specifying last date counting downloads. Default current date.

title: Fetch packages from CRAN — fetch_cran
text: data frame returning meta data package including total downloads downloads_from downloads_to.

title: Fetch packages from CRAN — fetch_cran
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ cran2024 <- fetch_cran(    author_names = c("Michael Lydeamore", "Di Cook", "Dianne Cook", "Hyndman"),    downloads_from = "2024-01-01",    downloads_to = "2024-12-31" ) } # }

title: Fetch publications from ORCID — fetch_orcid
text: Retrieves publications given ORCID IDs, returns tibble. publications DOIs returned. function uses ORCID API fetch DOIs, uses DOI API fetch publication details DOI.

code: fetch_orcid(orcid_ids)

title: Fetch publications from ORCID — fetch_orcid
text: orcid_ids character vector ORCID IDs.

title: Fetch publications from ORCID — fetch_orcid
text: tibble containing publications specified ORCID IDs.

title: Fetch publications from ORCID — fetch_orcid
text: function requires authentication ORCID. previously authenticated, prompt first run. just follow prompts, authenticated, downloading papers. want download papers ORCID IDs, need authenticate 2-legged OAuth. Follow instructions https://info.orcid.org/register--client-application-production-member-api/. avoid session, store token obtained orcid_auth() .Renviron file running usethis::edit_r_environ(). form ORCID_TOKEN=<token>.

title: Fetch publications from ORCID — fetch_orcid
Fetch publications from PURE — fetch_pure
text: download data PURE, necessary access API via Simon Angus Astro team https://astro.monash.edu/. API key stored environment variable PURE_API_KEY. can add environment using edit_r_environ(). end-point restricted Monash IP addresses. either use campus invoke VPN using campus.

title: Fetch publications from PURE — fetch_pure
code: fetch_pure(years)

title: Fetch publications from PURE — fetch_pure
text: years numeric vector publication years. publications minimum year maximum year returned.

title: Fetch publications from PURE — fetch_pure
text: data frame containing data fetched PURE API covering specified publication years.

title: Fetch publications from PURE — fetch_pure
text: Publications 2024 available ebs_pure dataset.

what: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
title: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
text: Given list journal titles, function return ranking various lists. Data sets used : monash: Monash Business School abdc: Australian Business Deans' Council era2010: ERA 2010 core: CORE scimago: SCImago function used Journal rankings shiny app.

title: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
code: journal_ranking(   title,   source = c("monash", "abdc", "era2010", "core", "scimago"),   fuzzy = TRUE,   only_best = length(title) > 1,   ... )

title: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
text: title character vector containing (partial) journal names. source character string indicating ranking data base use. Default "monash". fuzzy fuzzy matching used. FALSE, partial exact matching used. Otherwise, full fuzzy matching used. only_best TRUE, best matching journal returned. ... arguments passed agrepl (fuzzy TRUE), grepl otherwise.

title: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
text: data frame containing journal title, rank source matching journal.

title: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
text: Rob J Hyndman

title: Find rankings of journals from the Monash Business School, ABDC, CORE, SCImago or ERA2010. — journal_ranking
code: # Return ranking for individual journals or conferences journal_ranking("Annals of Statistics") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   title                rank     #>   <chr>                <fct>    #> 1 Annals of Statistics Group 1+ journal_ranking("Annals of Statistics", "abdc") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   title                rank  #>   <chr>                <ord> #> 1 Annals of Statistics A*    journal_ranking("International Conference on Machine Learning") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   title                                        rank    #>   <chr>                                        <fct>   #> 1 International Conference on Machine Learning Group 1 journal_ranking("International Conference on Machine Learning", "core") #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   title                                                         rank  #>   <chr>                                                         <ord> #> 1 International Conference on Machine Learning                  A*    #> 2 International Conference on Machine Learning and Applications C     #> 3 International Conference on Machine Learning and Cybernetics  NA    journal_ranking("R Journal", "scimago", only_best = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   title     rank  #>   <chr>     <chr> #> 1 R Journal Q1

title: SCImago Journal Rank for all journals indexed by Scopus — scimago
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 31136 rows 27 columns.

title: SCImago Journal Rank for all journals indexed by Scopus — scimago
text: SCImago, (n.d.). SJR — SCImago Journal & Country Rank. Retrieved 2021-11-28, https://www.scimagojr.com/journalrank.php

title: SCImago Journal Rank for all journals indexed by Scopus — scimago
text: tibble 31136 rows 27 variables: year Year SCImago Journal Ranking calculation. rank Rank journal among journals. sourceid Database ID journal. title Jounal's title. type Type: "journal", "book series", "trade journal", "conference proceedings" issn ISSN journal identifier. sjr SCImago Journal Rank indicator. expresses average number weighted citations received selected year documents published selected journal three previous years, –.e. weighted citations received year X documents published journal years X-1, X-2 X-3. See detailed description SJR (PDF). sjr_best_quartile Highest quartile journal among categories belongs . h_index Hirsch index journal. h index expresses journal's number articles (h) received least h citations. quantifies journal scientific productivity scientific impact also applicable scientists, countries, etc. (see H-index wikipedia definition). total_docs_year Total number published documents within specific year. types documents considered, including citable non citable documents. total_docs_3years Published documents three previous years (selected year documents excluded), .e.year X selected, X-1, X-2 X-3 published documents retrieved. types documents considered, including citable non citable documents. total_refs Total number citations received journal documents published within specific year. total_cites_3years Number citations received seleted year journal documents published three previous years, –.e. citations received year X documents published years X-1, X-2 X-3. types documents considered. citable_docs_3years Number citable documents published journal three previous years (selected year documents excluded). Exclusively articles, reviews conference papers considered.. cites_doc_2years Average citations per document 2 year period. computed considering number citations received journal current year documents published two previous years, –.e. citations received year X documents published years X-1 X-2. Comparable Journal Impact Factor. ref_doc Average number references per document selected year.. country Country publisher. publisher Publisher journal. categories Categories jounal belongs . highest_category Category journal ranks highest percentile. highest_rank Rank journal highest_category. highest_percentile Highest percentile journal category.

title: SCImago Journal Rank for all journals indexed by Scopus — scimago
text: Rob Hyndman
